languages.text: "Мы должны как можно скорее сообщить экипажу, что вы живы. Уверен, команда поддержит вас против мятежников".
"We must inform the crew that you are alive as soon as we can. I am confident that your people will rally behind you to fight back against the mutineers."
languages.original_text: "Мы должны как можно скорее сообщить экипажу, что вы живы. Уверен, команда поддержит вас против мятежников".

traits.locale_text: "We must inform the crew that you are alive as soon as we can. I am confident that your people will rally behind you to fight back against the mutineers."
"We must inform the crew that you are alive as soon as we can. I am confident that your people will rally behind you to fight back against the mutineers."
"We must inform the crew that you are alive as soon as we can. I am confident that your people will rally behind you to fight back against the mutineers."
"We must inform the crew that you are alive as soon as we can. I am confident that your people will rally behind you to fight back against the mutineers."
"We must inform the crew that you are alive as soon as we can. I am confident that your people will rally behind you to fight back against the mutineers."
"We must inform the crew that you are alive as soon as we can. I am confident that your people will rally behind you to fight back against the mutineers."
"We must inform the crew that you are alive as soon as we can. I am confident that your people will rally behind you to fight back against the mutineers."
"We must inform the crew that you are alive as soon as we can. I am confident that your people will rally behind you to fight back against the mutineers."

languages.text: "Wir müssen die Crew schnellstmöglich informieren, dass Ihr noch lebt. Ich bin zuversichtlich, dass Eure Leute die Meuterer an Eurer Seite zurückschlagen werden."
languages.original_text: "We must inform the crew that you are alive as soon as we can. I am confident that your people will rally behind you to fight back against the mutineers."

traits.locale_text: "Wir müssen die Crew schnellstmöglich informieren, dass Ihr noch lebt. Ich bin zuversichtlich, dass Eure Leute die Meuterer an Eurer Seite zurückschlagen werden."

languages.text: « Nous devons faire savoir à l'équipage que vous êtes en vie le plus vite possible. Nul doute que votre peuple se ralliera à vous pour lutter contre les mutins. »
languages.original_text: "We must inform the crew that you are alive as soon as we can. I am confident that your people will rally behind you to fight back against the mutineers."

traits.locale_text: « Nous devons faire savoir à l'équipage que vous êtes en vie le plus vite possible. Nul doute que votre peuple se ralliera à vous pour lutter contre les mutins. »

languages.text: «Debemos informar a la tripulación de que aún vive cuanto antes. Seguro que su gente le apoyará contra los amotinados».
languages.original_text: "We must inform the crew that you are alive as soon as we can. I am confident that your people will rally behind you to fight back against the mutineers."

traits.locale_text: «Debemos informar a la tripulación de que aún vive cuanto antes. Seguro que su gente le apoyará contra los amotinados».

languages.text: 「あなたが生きていることを、できるだけ早くクルーに知らせなくてはなりません。反乱軍に反撃するべく、あなたの人民はついてきてくれることでしょう」
languages.original_text: "We must inform the crew that you are alive as soon as we can. I am confident that your people will rally behind you to fight back against the mutineers."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたが生きていることを、できるだけ早くクルーに知らせなくてはなりません。反乱軍に反撃するべく、あなたの人民はついてきてくれることでしょう」

languages.text: “我们必须尽快通知全体船员，告知他们您还活着。我相信您的臣民会团结在您的旗帜之下，对叛乱分子发起反击。”
languages.original_text: "We must inform the crew that you are alive as soon as we can. I am confident that your people will rally behind you to fight back against the mutineers."

traits.locale_text: “我们必须尽快通知全体船员，告知他们您还活着。我相信您的臣民会团结在您的旗帜之下，对叛乱分子发起反击。”
